enums.name: "edit"
enums.description: Like `<!enum class>Text` but allows user to edit the text.

enums.name: "checkbox"
enums.description: Renders a checkbox, the data type must be Boolean.

enums.name: "custom"
enums.description:
Supports arbitrary type of data but a drawing function has to be provided.
Note that native objects like `Image` can not be passed to `Table` as
data.
